Package Tekiz._DPSCalculator._DPSCalculator.model.player

Class Special

java.lang.Object
Tekiz._DPSCalculator._DPSCalculator.model.player.Special
public class Special extends Object
Represents a players SPECIAL stats.

  • Method Details

    • modifySpecial

      public void modifySpecial(Specials special, int value)
      A method to modify the players special stats.
      Parameters:
      special - The stat the user wishes to modify. See Specials for valid values.
      value - The Integer value the user wishes to add or subtract to the special. The target stat cannot be set below 1 or higher than 15.

    • modifySpecialCheck

      private int modifySpecialCheck(int current, int value)
      A method that the special class uses internally to ensure that a SPECIALs value does not go above 1 or below 15.
      Parameters:
      current - The Integer value of the chosen special stat.
      value - The Integer value that the user wishes to add or subtract from the @{code current} value.
      Returns:
      Integer The modified value between the defined range (1 - 15).
